title: Update caused toolbars to vanish; downgrading lost all my data
content: I opened Firefox to find the recent automatic update (to 112) had caused a graphical glitch where the bookmarks toolbar vanished in fullscreen mode on Mac (10.15.7) and produced a strange grey bar along the top of the screen when not in fullscreen mode. I downgraded to the previous version and now I've lost all of my passwords and bookmarks even though I'm logged into my account. My main priority is to recover my passwords and bookmarks. Thanks for your help in advance.
creator: strawboy

title: Update - Addons removed, links and sign in gone
content:
Tonight's update has;

  • Removed all addons
  • Removed (or logged me out??) access to a couple of sites, including Firefox

After signing into Firefox, nothing came back. Yes, I shut everything down and restarted the PC.

Why? How? This is the first Firefox update that has done this to me.

Is this just a 'shoddy update' or something more problematic? Any ideas on how to avoid this?

Cheers, Craig.
creator: zenith_now

title: Problem with many .gov web sites.  FF not supported
content:
Over the last year, I am having trouble using FF on government web sites. When I click on a link, FF browser does not sync. Such as my last email when they sent me a link to take a survey. I click on take survey FF never opens the site. When I switch to chrome, it works fine.

It is really frustrating since I prefer FF but having to go to another browser is confusing.

Any ideas? I will gladly send you the email.
creator: pmshenosky

title: How can I change the default internet shortcut icon?
content:
I would like to change the default internet shortcut icon for firefox from the current icon (please see "current icon" image) to the firefox browser icon (please see the "desired icon" image).

Clarification:

  • Just in case it's unclear, what I mean by an "internet shortcut" is what you get when you drag the url of a website onto your desktop; it's a link/shortcut to that website;
  • I know how to change the icon for each individual shortcut; but I would like to change the default icon, so that I don't need to change each shortcut individually;
  • While looking for an answer to this question, I tried changing the browser.shell.shortcutFavicons setting in about:config; my understanding is that the default setting (true) will cause the icon to be different for each website; I do not want this; I want all internet shortcut icons to be identical and looking like the firefox browser icon; so I toggled this setting to false;

Thank you.
creator: an531

title: updating password failed? salanan vaihto meni pieleen?
content: Hei, koitin päivittää salasanani. Syötin kaksi kertaa uuden salasanan ja painoin OK, sitten tuli viesti "virheellinen salasana". Nyt en pääse kirjautumaan vanhalla enkä uudella salasanalla, molemmissa tapauksissa tulee virheviesti. Minun pitäisi ottaa käyttöön uusi kone, ja en pääse kirjautumaan siinä selaimeen ja synkronoimaan salasanoja yms. Pystyttekö auttamaan pikaisesti? :) <3

title: U2F using ledger
content:
Received this message thismorning while using my Ledger device:-

Something went wrong-U2F browser support is needed for Ledger. Please use Chrome, Opera or Firefox with a U2F extension. Also make sure you're on a HTTPS connection.

title: Hibakód: SEC_ERROR_PKCS11_GENERAL_ERROR
content:
Tisztelt Cím!

Ezt a dobja fel az oldal, amit előtte már 290 alkalommal megnyitottam és semmiképpen nem tudok továbblépni.

Hibakód: SEC_ERROR_PKCS11_GENERAL_ERROR

Szeretném ezt az oldalt továbbra is megnyitni és használni: https://arveres.mbvk.hu/arverezok/

Képernyőképet nem engedett készíteni.

Üdvözlettel: Csernus Tibor

title: bookmarks overwritten or erased ??
content:
Recently, my laptop got messed up and I've had to use a loaner provided my university. Initially I had no issue with transferring my bookmarks, as I just logged in to Firefox. However, the damn thing wipes everything whenever you log off or turn it off, and it decided to restart on its own when I left it alone for five minutes. So I was trying to recover my tabs, even though I knew it was unlikely to work, and one of the options for History said I could restore something with eleven items (I assumed it meant tabs, that sounded about right) and it warned me it would overwrite the bookmarks. I assumed that it meant the bookmarks I had at the time, which were the same bookmarks I've always had, so I said yes. But I guess it meant the default ones because the others hadn't loaded yet or something??? Because a bunch of random default tabs popped back up (not even eleven of them???) and the bookmarks are now solidly on just the default "Getting Started" and so on. I checked, it's the right account, it says my bookmarks are synced, there are no other files to restore from, and I don't get my actual laptop back for another week or two, so I can't check or restore from there. Are my bookmarks gone forever, or is there a chance I could recover them.... but only in a few weeks when I get my original laptop back (assuming THEY didn't wipe it again)? Or did it overwrite them for my profile in general, meaning it's synced and all my bookmarks are gone forever? Is there a way to restore them now, from the loaner laptop? I am in constant agony.

EDIT: Weirdly, I can still see my original bookmarks on my phone, which is promising--but I can't export a backup file from there, apparently, unless I want to import every single one one by one by sharing each one individually, which, no thank you. And I'm not sure if it's synced and am too scared to try. What's that one meme with Michael from the Good Place? "Birth is a curse and existence is a prison"? That's about how I'm feeling right now. It's 3 am.

EDIT 2: Fiddled around with it. Somehow fixed it. No fucking idea how. Sorry this was a pointless waste of cyber space. Wait, no, nevermind. I got OLD bookmarks back???? Like a few years old?????? What???????? I give up. This is better than nothing.
creator: tmbabe13

title: AdFender

Let me install it even if it's "corrupt". Microsoft has no issue. it works fine in Windows 10.

Please help, I love Firefox!!! Bonnie Edwards [removed email/phone# from public forum]

title: Helvetica font renders blank after updating to 112 via snap store
content:
After running `snap refresh firefox`, many sites I use no longer render any text.

Via some fiddling via the developer console, it appears to be that any text with `font-family: Helvetica`. Removing that CSS restores the text, adding it removes the text.

There's a fix for CVE-2023-29537 in this release that affects font initialization - possibly related?

content:

When i did the restoring my jsonlz4 file was at 1:08am but when i accidentally restarted my pc it now is saying 2:31am and all the tabs that i have restored so far are on it but not the ones i haven't restored are not.

So is there a way to be able to get that old jsonlz4 file back so that i can restore all the tabs that i used to have.

Please help.
